title: Reasons to Believe (Dr. Scott Hahn and Mike Aquilina)
description:
* If you don't want to download this, then don't.
* Nobody is forcing religion on you.
* If you're not interested in Catholicism, then please move along, nothing to see here.
* If you are Catholic, I apologize in advance for any rude comments that some may leave here.

A clear-sighted contemporary apologetic, providing an in-depth look at the "hows" and "whys" of Catholicism. Dr. Scott Hahn and co-host Mike Aquilina confront the current crisis of faith head on, showing why it is perfectly reasonable to believe in Christ and the Church. Drawing from a treasury of reason and revelation they illuminate the truths of the Faith with arguments from natural reason, everyday experience, Sacred Scripture, and much more. A rock-solid guide for understanding and defending the Catholic Faith.

Episode 1 - Apologetics The Art and Science of Explaining and Defending the Faith 
Episode 2 - Faith, Science and the Persuasive Power of the Universe
Episode 3 - The Problem of Evil
Episode 4 - Miracles, Prophecies and Other Motives of Credibility
Episode 5 - The Heavenly Kingdom and the Earthly Church
Episode 6 - The Old and New Hallmarks of the Kingdom
Episode 7 - The Kingdom and the Church
Episode 8 - The Gospel of Luke and the Institution of the Kingdom
Episode 9 - Acts of Faith
Episode 10 - The Bible and the Mass
Episode 11 - Peace of the Rock
Episode 12 - When the Reign Comes
Episode 13 - People, Get Ready

* Please seed, I can only seed these a short time due to bandwidth caps.
